plot: Rachel unexpectedly encounters an important figure from her past. Charlie finds herself on a mission in the Plains Nation. Neville and Jason search a refugee camp for Julia.

Six months have passed since the missiles were launched. Aaron turned off the electricity after only a few minutes but the missiles struck in any event. Miles and Rachel now live in Willoughby,Texas with Rachel's father Dr. Gene Porter. Rachel was in a near catatonic state when she arrived, blaming herself for he nuclear holocaust, but has recovered slowly. Aaron lives in the same town working as a teacher but Charlie left after only a few months and is now hunting Monroe . Aaron notices what appears to be a large number of green fireflies. The town itself may be under threat. At the Savannah refugee camp, Tom Neville searches in vain for his wife. When representatives of the U.S. government returns from their exile in Cuba, he sees through their lies and decides to do something about it.—garykmcd
